items.title: Automated User Provisioning (PowerShell)
items.desc: Script to create AD users, assign groups, and auto-apply M365 licenses from CSV.

items.title: M365 License Assignment Tool
items.desc: CLI utility to bulk assign and audit O365 licenses using Graph API.

items.title: Network Downtime Dashboard
items.desc: Lightweight dashboard that parses ping logs and visualizes downtime trends.

items.title: Endpoint Deployment Automation
items.desc: Automates Windows setup: join domain, apply baseline policies, install agents.
